text: In psychology, weaponized incompetence refers to a tactic by which someone avoids his or her duties by claiming that he or she is not good at a task. * * * * * Psychologist Dr. Susan Albers said that weaponized incompetence could occur in both workplace and romantic relationships. ==Examples== * Someone refuses to improve on certain tasks * Someone blames his or her partner for not showing him or her how to do a task ==Impact== Weaponized incompetence can cause hatred, and damage trust in a relationship. ==References== Category:Psychology Category:Relationships
title: Weaponized incompetence
